mapper.insert: insert into RTS_PRODUCRER_CONFIG (PK_ID, MD_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update RTS_PRODUCRER_CONFIG set MD_ID = #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MD_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_PRODUCRER_CONFIG where DEL_FLG = '0'

select pc.PK_ID, pc.MD_ID, pc.NAME, pc.DESCRIPTION, pc.NOTE, pc.DEL_FLG, pc.CRT_USER, pc.CRT_TIME, pc.UPT_USER, pc.UPT_TIME,md.NAME as MD_NAME,md.TOPIC as MD_TOPIC,ds.NAME as DS_NAME,ds.TYPE as DS_TYPE from RTS_PRODUCRER_CONFIG pc LEFT JOIN RTS_METADATA md ON pc.MD_ID=md.PK_ID LEFT JOIN COM_DATASOURCE ds ON md.DS_ID=ds.PK_ID where pc.DEL_FLG = '0' and pc.MD_ID = #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pc.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and ds.NAME like '%'||#{dsName}||'%' and md.NAME like '%'||#{mdName}||'%' and md.TOPIC like '%'||#{mdTopic}||'%' and ds.TYPE = #{dsType} and pc.DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{describe}||'%' and pc.NOTE LIKE '%'||#{note}||'%' and pc.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= pc.CRT_TIME and pc.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= pc.UPT_TIME and pc.CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and pc.UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' order by pc.NAME asc
select PK_ID, MD_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_PRODUCRER_CONFIG where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
